thread.title: Top location, positive and caring staff.
thread.title_full: Top location, positive and caring staff. - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LudvikG
title: Top location, positive and caring staff.
text: We stayed here 3 nights. Arrived at the day of the Westminster attack and were immediately met with a caring attitude by all of the staff. Basic room, good breakfast, fast check-in and check-out. Good value for money and will definately stay again when in London. Top location, especially if arriving at Luton Airport and travelling by train to St.Pancras station!
